alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Erie; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 11:34PM EDT until August 25 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erie County in north central Ohio... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Northern Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1133 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles north of Avon Lake to 8 miles southeast of Kelleys Island, moving southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Western Vermilion, Vermilion, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Solon, Avon Lake and Hudson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
